alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 8:43PM MST until December 27 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Wind gusts to 40 mph will cause widespread blowing and drifting and reduced visibility. * WHERE...Southwest Idaho Highlands zone. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
